subject: Colleges and Universities
Basketball (College)
Football (College)
College Athletics
Scholarships and Fellowships
lead_paragraph: South Carolina announced Thursday that it would guarantee four-year scholarships for football and men’s basketball players and would offer students getting full scholarships the “full cost of attendance.”
snippet: South Carolina announced Thursday that it would guarantee four-year scholarships for football and men’s basketball players and would offer students getting full scholarships the “full cost of attendance.”
